name: Windows Escape
description:
The player got stuck inside windows, help him escape by turning off the PC!

This game can be played by 1 or 2 players. We recommend playing with someone! One uses the keyboard to move the player and the other one uses the mouse.

This game was made for "livre game jam" in 48h. This is a Open Source game.

Open Source Softwares used in this project:
Godot and Krita

Credits:
